tweets.text: More than 300,000 homes are better protected from flooding since 2015 - 90 of these were in #Godalming after a 525-metre flood wall was built along the banks of the Hell‚Äôs Ditch. https://t.co/bzI0I4vq05

We‚Äôve delivered our largest ever programme of #flood and coastal defence improvements!

Working with partners, we‚Äôve helped protect over 300,000 homes from flooding and supported communities to become more resilient to #ClimateChange

#FCERM https://t.co/mS2pKBFb18

urls.title: More than 300,000 homes better protected from flooding since 2015

https://t.co/rWpgguvsIG

Another of our 300,000 homes schemes - in Marlow we worked in partnership with @BucksCouncil, @MarlowTC and the local community to deliver this ¬£9.5 million scheme in 2018. The new defences and pumps reduce flooding to 287 properties and 18 hectares of habitat were created. https://t.co/duEDFt8aTx

Read more about the scheme here https://t.co/wtA68P1squ https://t.co/IQ4IgfTlmc

We have completed the #Houghton Brook #flood storage area in partnership with @SEMLEP & @lutoncouncil This will help protect 600 properties.

Do you know where the water from your dishwasher, washing machine, bath or shower goes? 

Misconnected properties can pollute rivers and seas and harm wildlife. Check your property is connected right.
